text: Great service, fresh ingredients, great prices. I absolutely love how you can build your own pizza with whatever sauce and toppings you like.

text: Beware of Blaze! I hope they can get there major problems fixed after reopening. At this moment they seem not to care about there customers at all. Let me explain please. I called them and got their auto attendant which directed me to order ‚Ä¶More

text: One of my preferred places for quality Pizza. Visited about four, it was not full. The service was sociable and attentive. The prices are fair for the quality of food.

name: Victoria W
text: Great service! The guy that made my pizzas was super friendly, and seems like he really likes his job!

name: Sky S.
text: Service was great. Order was correct, however my pizza was extremely burnt. The flavor was good but nearly inedible due to the incredibly black crust.

name: Douglas Wilson
text: Amazing place. I look at Blaze Pizza like the Subway for pizza. You pick the toppings you want and they are fresh and yummy.

name: Jeffery Hill
text: I always love the variety of pizzas to make and now they've expanded their crust options, its even better.

name: Jeff
text: This was my first visit to Blaze.  The staff was pleasant and accommodating. Ordered two pies, which were delicious. Great crust (the mark of a good pizza) with tasty toppings.  Will definitely come back.

name: Michael Brown

text: Awesome place , first time here and it was a great experience. Pizza was delicious and am not a pizza lover. The staff is well train and eager to help you. Places like this are hard to find. Keep it up all your staff are well train

text: The pizza is good but not the best. Watching the pizza cook in the oven is pretty cool. The place has a higher end fast food chain feel to it. Need to try a few different pizza to really give it a feel.

text: Love the concept, just pay a price for a pizza and put whatever u want on it!  A lot like Chipotle (sides selection and freshness) just with pizzas.  Modern atmosphere too. Plus they have a lemonade bar that is awesome!! Can't wait to come back!

text: I got a build your own pizza and felt restricted with what I could put on my pie which made me sad. With that said, ingredients were solid and fresh.

text: Easily the best pizza place in Central Arkansas! Pizza your way at an awesome price. The staff is always friendly and it never takes long to get food. They have an app to help you earn free food and order ahead. They have unique a non-alcoholic drink selection. Great place!
